BR_text.BRsummary: [gcp] v0.3.0-rc.1 cert manager can't get the SSL certificate
BR_text.BRdescription:
When I started Kubeflow on GCP with v0.3.0-rc.1, certmanager is having problems.
 <denchmark-code>E0929 19:50:10.497029       1 reflector.go:205] github.com/jetstack/cert-manager/pkg/client/informers/externalversions/factory.go:71: Failed to list *v1alpha1.Issuer: v1alpha1.IssuerList: Items: []v1alpha1.Issuer: v1alpha1.Issuer: Spec: v1alpha1.IssuerSpec: IssuerConfig: ACME: v1alpha1.ACMEIssuer: HTTP01: skipObjectDecoder: expect object or null, error found in #10 byte of ...|,"http01":"","privat|..., bigger context ...|pec":{"acme":{"email":"jlewi@google.com","http01":"","privateKeySecretRef":{"name":"letsencrypt-prod|...
 
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/1541>#1541</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
I suspect this was fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/1580>#1580</denchmark-link>
  and the changes need to be cherry picked onto the release branch.

comments_4.comment_text: Should be fixed in latest RC.
